result.text: The word "inclusive" signifies one of the key priorities of the @APEC Meeting 2023. At the forefront of inclusive development in the Asia-Pacific region, China promotes infrastructure construction, boosts trade and investment, and bridges the digital divide. CGTN's Michelle Van den Bergh explains in this video how China can help transform the vision of an inclusive Asia Pacific into reality. (Script by: He Jingyi) #BizFocus #APEC2023

result.text:
#China’s economy will keep a sound momentum of recovery in the fourth quarter of this year, remaining as an important engine of world economic growth, said Chinese finance minister Lan Fan, at the #APEC Finance Ministers' Meeting being held from November 12-13. 
He also called for closer macroeconomic policy coordination and efforts to facilitate trade and investment, in order to jointly build an open Asia-Pacific and world economy, against a backdrop of weak global economic recovery. #APEC2023

user_mentions.name: AGRA - Sustainably Growing Africa’s Food Systems.

legacy.full_text:
Africa can learn from China in agriculture, said Hailemariam Desalegn, Board Chair of AGRA, in an interview with CGTN's Wang Tianyu.
He also appreciated the Belt and Road Initiative, which has helped Africa to achieve "huge leap" in infrastructure development. @AGRA_Africa https://t.co/WiwgFSjlBu

result.text: The Wanbao Mozambique rice farm is the largest rice farm in Mozambique. Since 2017, the project has been helping local farmers with farmland development, grain storage and processing, provided agricultural materials and machinery, as well as sharing Chinese rice planting technologies. (Photos via CR20)

result.text:
The Asia-Pacific region is the center of the global economy, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said at the opening ceremony of Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) finance ministers' meeting on Nov.13. 
Since APEC members represent one of the fastest growing and the most dynamic economies in the world, the actions they take matter, not only for their own economies and peoples, but also for addressing the global challenges the world faces, she said. #APEC2023 #BizFocus
